Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice coffee shop, the offer pastries with the coffee. The coffee is good and the service is fast.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Delicious coffee with good atmosphere, and enjoyable music. Can get crowded at times.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: It‚Äôs located in a very cool area but I don‚Äôt know if I just had a bad day with the staff here, they were kind or rude. Not very nice and she had a very bad mood to my eyes. I guess everyone can have bad days but I didn‚Äôt get a good vibe ‚Ä¶

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: People are nice. I'm a huge fan of the chai masala latte. Not a huge fan of most of other things on the menu. I go there for a place to sit and be left alone as you tend to want in a coffee shop. The staff are polite and nice.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: I saw someone screw up multiple toasti‚Äôs I hope the CEO toastie will see this and remove his product from this store. An abberation to all toastie lovers. GANGGANG

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: This is a nice and hip coffee shop to hang out at. The music is good and not too loud. A good place to come work out. The staff is helpful and the ambiance is nice. I had ordered the hot chocolonely and it wasn't the best hot chocolate i ‚Ä¶

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text:
Lovely place to have a coffee and plenty of space for work or study. Nice view on the upper floor.
There are outlets to charge your phone or laptop!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice sandwich with great coffee

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Expensive, but good tasting coffee, at a location where the lower level of the store and outside seem to be more utilized for coffee drinking and socializing, while the upper level is under a heavy laptop influence (for all you freelancers)

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: very nice atmosphere and location, with a perfect study/work space upstairs:)

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Simple but good choices, and a good spot to avoid the rain with a cup of coffee

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: favorite place to drink coffee in Amsterdam. good coffee and sandwiches...

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee is good, cakes same. Upstairs you can find quite place for work or study. Cool.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: I love this place! Good service and good coffee.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good tea selection, and they give you the bag separate from the water by default. Staff are friendly. Excellent WiFi and great working space upstairs (as long as you don't need an outlet; those are sparse). Clean bathroom. My only complaint is the music, but I suspect it's not a problem for most, as others seemed to be enjoying it.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text:
A friend of mine recommended this cafe
I came with high expectations and tried out the Matcha Almond Latte with vanilla but could hardly get the vanilla flavour. Nothing great or extraordinary in my opinion.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly. Only coffee open after 6pm on Saturday! Great and easily accessible

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: The place is Gentle. But the coffee stains on the table caught my attention that means it hasn't been cleaned. This means it has not been sterilized

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Worst service, they could not take/make our order right. It took them 4 times. On the other hand they didnt stop us when we brought coffees from the starbucks across the street (there was no place sit down in starbucks). Perfect example of how not to run business and how ignore guests and have a chat with work buddies.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Great service, very nice coffee for reasonable pricing. Upstairs seating area where people love to study or work. In my own experience, calm enough to study, but the ambience is still cozy

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: I take when you go upstairs you have to be so quiet like a library, as we all got looks as we spoke, I will be back in the near future and hope to see this on my next visit as coffee was lovely, and staff ,it was the amount studying on ‚Ä¶

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Great Matcha, friendly staff, big tables üëè

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text:
A network of Cafes in Amsterdam.
This is the local answer to Starbucks... And  a very good one.
The off is very good and they have sandwiches and cakes.
This is a perfect place for meetings or just to sip a coffee.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee for standard high range coffee house prices. A normal coffee for under 4‚Ç¨ is not really possible, but the quality is very good.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Great atmosphere, very nice stuff. Sat at the upper floor, drank coffee and lemonade.  Restrooms were very clean. Nice place to sit and relax and watch Amsterdam's ongoing for a while

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee was good, but the hot chocolate was the best I‚Äôve ever had. It‚Äôs a cozy cafe with very friendly employees.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Worst almond ‚Äúcap‚Äù I‚Äôve ever had. Burned coffee, burned milk, no chocolate on top. A rip-off, worst ‚Ç¨4,45 I have ever spend.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: The atmosphere is nice, some people are studying while others are just chatting and drinking some coffee. The taste of the coffee is really good and that‚Äôs the reason I come here a lot!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Very good coffee and also fair pricing considering the size of the cups. Freshly brewed espresso and americano are a good choice.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Best baristas in town that make the best coffee in town. Oh, and that coffee combines very well with their fresh croissants. Yum!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee and a laid back environment where you can chill and get stuff done. Think of this place as the local version of Starbucks only much much better.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Super good coffee, very nice baristas and the upstairs area is very cute and offers a great view on the street. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Coffee Company, known as CC De Bol Amsterdam for this location, is a Dutch coffee chain, that was founded in 1996 in Amsterdam. There are currently 35 locations, and CC is an independently operating company under the umbrella of Jacobs Douwe Egberts. The De Pijp location, is a great place to bask in the sunshine on their terrace.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice coffee, and very small place, so hard to find somewhere to sit and enjoy it

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee, WiFi okay. Nice view from upper floor. But they charge their guest 50 cents to use the restroom!!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Best coffee company location I've been to. Great upper floor which is cozy and overlooks de Pijp. Food and drinks are average for the company.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Great coffee and the staff is really friendly. Always coming back to this place even on my third visit to Amsterdam!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good location and friendly enough staff. Coffee quality really depends on who‚Äôs making it. Nothing exceptional

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: I love this place so cozy each place has a different setup with different couches and different nooks the coffee is really good

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffee, wonderful service. Equipped with two floors and outside seating. Good views on selected seats.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Very expensive coffee. Nice working place but almost NO plugs for the computer, which is quite disappointing. Bad customer service.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Extremely slow service. We waited more than 10 minutes although this is a self service place where you need to order and pick up yourself. There are better places in the neighbourhood, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend going there.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Everything was nice except one thing. The 3 ladies in the counter kept talking too loud... I was wearing an earphone and listening music to work, but their voice distracted me quite much.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Oh great time to have a break.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice place to chill out. Hot chocolate is very warming and the cakes are nice. Didn't try the coffee...

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Beautiful location and excellent coffee. Check out their strippenkaart

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: I ordered dark mocha and it was just a wonderful way to start my day! 10/10 would revisit!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: The double cappuccino was huge with silky smooth milk. Very friendly service.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text:
One of my favorite places to drink coffee in Amsterdam.
Good coffee, nice cakes and some sandwiches. Perfect!

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good latte. They can also do iced coffee here. Several flavorings available as well.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Nice place for a coffee. Really quiet upstairs. This is my favourite of the small chain.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good coffe with a relaxed atmosphere. Good to read or have a chat with friends.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Good variety, and loads of space to sit and do work. Good views from upstairs. I'd enjoy coming to work on projects here.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Decent coffee, fast service. It's a local company so I prefer this to the American brand nearby.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Very nice coffee and pleasant staff.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Friendly staff, good service. Coffee is on the pricey side...

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: Very disappointed, trying to get a decent coffee here is impossible plus the prices are very high for the quality.

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text:

Name: The Coffee Company
Review Text: There was a young man and a girl working snd they were friendly and genuine.  Very happy. Great to see.
